title: WTB: T206 Cincinnati Lionel Carter Card
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Cincinnati Lionel Carter Card
posts.post_content:
This may be a long shot, but I'd like to add a Lionel Carter card to my T206 Cincinnati run. If anyone is willing to part with one from their collection I would be very interested.

  * Bob Bescher (Hands In Air)
  * Bob Bescher (Portrait)
  * Billy Campbell
  * Tom Downey (Batting)
  * Tom Downey (Fielding)
  * Jean Dubuc
  * Dick Egan
  * Bob Ewing
  * Art Fromme
  * Harry Gasper
  * Clark Griffith (Batting)
  * Clark Griffith (Portrait)
  * Dick Hoblitzell
  * Miller Huggins (Hands At Mouth)
  * Miller Huggins (Portrait)
  * Ed Karger
  * Hans Lobert
  * Larry McLean
  * Mike Mitchell
  * Mike Mowrey
  * Rebel Oakes
  * Dode Paskert
  * Bob Spade


The Huggins and Griffith may be out of my price range, but would still like to hear what an asking price is.
